name: ether-gamma
description: Etherium blockchian push the button game.

scripts.build: mkdir -p build/ && npm run browserify -- --debug -o build/ether-gamma.js
scripts.dist: mkdir -p dist/ && npm run browserify -s -- --debug | exorcist dist/ether-gamma.js.map > dist/ether-gamma.js && uglifyjs dist/ether-gamma.js -c warnings=false -m -o dist/ether-gamma.min.js
scripts.integration-test: truffle compile && truffle migrate && truffle test
